body_html:
For multiple reasons, bazel will stay as our primary build system.
cmake wont be promoted to core.
I am not against the test itself, I am happy to accept a test as you described as a contribution, and run it under contrib/cmake. But it is not a priority for us.
body_text:
For multiple reasons, bazel will stay as our primary build system.
cmake wont be promoted to core.
I am not against the test itself, I am happy to accept a test as you described as a contribution, and run it under contrib/cmake. But it is not a priority for us.
body:
For multiple reasons, bazel will stay as our primary build system.
cmake wont be promoted to core.
I am not against the test itself, I am happy to accept a test as you described as a contribution, and run it under contrib/cmake. But it is not a priority for us.
